registration.question: How do I register for Faxi?
registration.answer: Registration is simple! Just send a fax to our number (050-5050-8899 in Japan or 1-302-400-8899 in USA) with your name and contact information. We'll send you a welcome fax with your account details and instructions to get started.

cost.question: How much does Faxi cost?
cost.answer: Faxi charges a small fee per fax transaction. Basic requests (email, Q&A) cost ¥100 per fax. Shopping and appointment services may have additional fees depending on the service provider. You'll always see the cost before confirming any transaction.

faxMachine.question: What kind of fax machine do I need?
faxMachine.answer: Any standard fax machine works with Faxi! As long as your fax machine can send and receive faxes, you're all set. No special equipment or modifications needed.

handwriting.question: Can I use handwriting or does it need to be typed?
handwriting.answer: Both handwriting and typed text work perfectly! Our AI can read clear handwriting in Japanese or English. Just write legibly and we'll understand your request.

languages.question: What languages does Faxi support?
languages.answer: Faxi currently supports Japanese and English. You can write your requests in either language, and we'll respond in the same language you used.

responseTime.question: How long does it take to get a response?
responseTime.answer: Most requests are processed within 2-5 minutes. You'll receive a confirmation fax as soon as your request is complete. Complex requests like shopping or appointments may take up to 15 minutes.

multipleRequests.question: Can I send multiple requests in one fax?
multipleRequests.answer: Yes! You can include multiple requests in a single fax. Just clearly separate each request and number them (1, 2, 3, etc.). We'll process each one and send back a comprehensive response.

followUp.question: How do I follow up on a previous request?
followUp.answer: Each response fax includes a reference number. To follow up, just mention that reference number in your new fax. For example: "Regarding request #12345, I'd like to..." This helps us find your previous conversation quickly.

notReceived.question: I sent a fax but didn't receive a response. What should I do?
notReceived.answer: First, check that your fax was sent successfully (your fax machine should show a confirmation). If it was sent but you haven't received a response after 15 minutes, send another fax with "RESEND REQUEST" and your original fax details. We'll investigate and respond promptly.

unclear.question: The response fax was unclear or hard to read. What can I do?
unclear.answer: Send us a fax saying "REQUEST CLEARER RESPONSE" with your reference number. We'll resend the information in a larger, clearer format. You can also request information by phone if needed.

wrongInfo.question: The response had incorrect information. How do I fix this?
wrongInfo.answer: Send a correction fax with your reference number and explain what was incorrect. For example: "Regarding #12345, the email address should be..." We'll update the information and send a corrected response.

pricing.question: How am I billed for Faxi services?
pricing.answer: You'll receive a monthly invoice by fax showing all your transactions. You can pay by bank transfer, convenience store payment, or have a family member pay online. We also offer prepaid packages for discounted rates.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods can I use for shopping?
paymentMethods.answer: For online shopping through Faxi, you can pay by: (1) Credit card - register once and we'll charge automatically, (2) Bank transfer - we'll send you bank details by fax, or (3) Convenience store payment - bring the barcode fax to any konbini. You choose your preferred method when you first shop with us.

paymentSecurity.question: Is my payment information safe?
paymentSecurity.answer: Yes, absolutely. We use Stripe, a trusted international payment processor used by millions of businesses. Your credit card information is encrypted and never stored on our servers. For bank transfers and convenience store payments, no sensitive information is needed.

refund.question: Can I get a refund if something goes wrong?
refund.answer: Yes! If we make an error or you're not satisfied with the service, we'll refund the transaction fee. Just send a fax explaining the issue within 7 days of the transaction.

dataPrivacy.question: Is my information kept private and secure?
dataPrivacy.answer: Absolutely! All faxes are encrypted and stored securely. We never share your personal information with third parties without your permission. Your data is protected by Japanese privacy laws and our strict security policies.

dataRetention.question: How long do you keep my fax records?
dataRetention.answer: We keep your fax records for 90 days to help with follow-up requests and support. After 90 days, records are automatically deleted unless you request longer retention. You can request deletion of your records at any time.

whoCanSee.question: Who can see my faxes and personal information?
whoCanSee.answer: Only authorized Faxi staff who need to process your requests can see your faxes. All staff sign confidentiality agreements. We use AI to process most requests automatically, minimizing human access to your information.
